Perks Program Terms and Conditions

  1. PERFUMANIA PERKS PROGRAM TERMS AND CONDITIONS
  2. Consumer Disclosures Regarding Points
  3. The Perfumania Perks Program described herein (the "Perks Program") is conducted by and for Perf Opco, LLC and Perfumania.com (collectively "Perfumania"), a subsidiary company of Obsession Operating, Inc., with its principal office at 2650 SW 145th Ave, Miramar, FL 33027.
  4. Membership and participation in the Perks Program is free to eligible persons. See Section 2 of these Perfumania Perks Program terms and conditions (the "Terms and Conditions") for eligibility requirements.
  5. Subject to these Terms and Conditions, Members of the Perks Program ("Members") earn points ("Points") with every completed purchase made directly from Perfumania stores (Perfumania Stores) or on the Perfumania website - Perfumania.com (the "Website"). The number of Points earned per dollar spent is based on the tier level a Member has reached ("Membership Tier"). Membership Tier is based on the amount spent by the Member at Perfumania stores or on the Website during a rolling 365-day period. There are three Membership Tiers: Bronze, Silver, and Gold. The benefits provided to each Membership Tier are discussed in Section 4.
  6. Membership Tiers and Points balances will be available via the Website and, upon request, at Perfumania "bricks and mortar" stores. Points earned and changes to Membership Tiers based on purchases at Perfumania "bricks and mortar" stores may take up to 24 hours to appear online after a purchase is made in the store. Points are earned only for whole dollars spent. PointsARE NOT AWARDED: (1) with respect to any tax spent on purchases; (2) with respect to shipping and/or handling charges; OR (3) in connection with the purchase of gift cards. Points are earned only with respect to the price actually paid for the Perfumania product purchased by the Member, exclusive of any discounts, shipping and handling charges and/or any taxes. For example, if an item is on sale or being sold at a discount, Points are earned with respect to the sales price or discounted price actually paid, not the original price.
  7. Points are not transferable or assignable, have no independent monetary value and may not be redeemed for cash, merchandise, or any other benefit, except that they may be redeemed for Perfumania merchandise as expressly provided in these Terms and Conditions. Points can be used only once and only by the Member to whom they were awarded.
  8. Points expire after eighteen (18) continuous months of purchase inactivity by the MEMBER.
  9. A Members Membership Tier may be automatically downgraded, as explained in Section 5.
  10. PointsCANNOT BE USED towards the purchase of gift cards.
  11. Membership and Eligibility Requirements
  12. Membership in the Perks Program is available at no cost to all persons who (i) are legal residents of one of the fifty (50) United States, and (ii) are at least 18 years of age. A purchase is not necessary to become a Member of the Perks Program.
  13. To sign up for the Perks Program, log on to the Website and follow the prompts or visit a Perfumania store and sign up there.
  14. Each Member's right to accumulate and use Points is conditioned upon the Member's agreement to and compliance with these Terms and Conditions and the terms and conditions of the Website, including the Perfumania Privacy Policy set forth at https://perfumania.com/pages/privacy-policy ("Privacy Policy"), then in effect. By joining the Perks Program, each Member agrees to the Perks Program Terms and Conditions and the terms and conditions of the Website and Privacy Policy then in effect, and agrees, among other things, to Perfumania's use of the Member's personal information in the manner and in accordance with the Privacy Policy. In addition, a Member's use of Points constitutes that Member's confirmation of his/her agreement to these Terms and Conditions and the terms and conditions of the Website and Privacy Policy then in effect.
  15. Perfumania reserves the right to terminate and/or refuse membership to any person it determines, in its sole discretion, has not complied with these Terms and Conditions, or is responsible for tampering with the Perks Program sign up process and/or any other aspect of the Perks Program, as provided in Section 15.
  16. Eligible Transactions/Activities
  17. Subject to the exceptions listed in these Terms and Conditions, all Member purchases directly from Perfumania, whether online or at physical Perfumania stores, are eligible for earning Points. It is also possible that Points could be earned for eligible activities, such as responding to a survey. Perfumania is the final authority on whether a transaction or activity qualifies for an award of Points, and Perfumania reserves the right to deduct Points from a Member's Account (defined below) at any time in its sole discretion.
  18. Any attempt to obtain Points as a result of a transaction or other qualifying activity for which a Perks Program Member has already received credit is prohibited and shall constitute a violation of these Terms and Conditions.
  19. Points will not be given or awarded (or may be recaptured and voided if already awarded) for the following:

* Cancelled orders

* Orders that are not fully paid

* Shipping and handling charges

* Any and all applicable taxes

* Gift card purchases

* Refunded purchases

  1. Membership Tiers

Members of the Perks Program earn Points and benefits based on their Membership Tier. Benefits can be combined with other Perfumania offers and promotions. The Membership Tier benefits are set forth and explained below.

  1. Points Earning Ratio per Dollar Spent: This number correlates to the number of Points earned per dollar spent in Perfumania Stores or on the Website. Earned points can take up to two (2) business days to appear in a Members account after either the goods are purchased in-store or, in the case of purchases made on the Website, the goods are shipped to the Member.
  2. Points Redemptions: Points are tendered at the conversion rate of 1%. Examples of the conversion are set forth below:
  • Member has 100 points - $1 off purchase
  • Member has 1,000 points - $10 off purchase
  • Member has 1,500 points - $15 off purchase
  1. Free Samples Program: Free samples can be obtained in Perfumania stores and through the Website.
  2. Fragrance Insiders Program: Gold Members are given early access to new products at Perfumania stores and on the Website.
  3. Free Shipping on All Orders (Gold Members Only): This applies to purchases on the Website.

  1. Automatic Downgrade

Members can be automatically downgraded from their current Membership Tier if their spending in any 365-day period falls below the amount required for such Tier. For example, on June 1, 2023 a Member enters the Silver Tier by spending $250 at any Perfumania store or on the Website. If on June 1, 2024 the Member has not spent an additional $250 or more, the Member will be automatically downgraded to the Bronze Tier. The Member can reenter the Silver Tier upon reaching the $250 requirement for the 365-day period starting on the date the $250 spend requirement was satisfied.

  1. Points Redemption

Points may be redeemed for purchases at checkout in store and online. Members must provide either an email address or phone number to the sales associate at the beginning or during the transaction to redeem available Points in the Perfumania stores. For online purchases made on the Website, a Members available Points balance will be displayed from the Account page and may be redeemed during check-out.

  1. Returns/Exchanges
  2. Return with a receipt(not an exchange)- If a Member is returning item(s) for which a return is allowed (see Perfumanias return policy for details) and for which a Points redemption was used for the original purchase, the Member will receive back in cash or credit (depending on how the original purchase was transacted) the price of the item(s) minus the Points tendered. The Member will NOT receive back cash or credit for the amount of the Points redeemed in the original purchase, but the Points will be returned to the Member's available Points balance.Example- A Member purchased an item priced at $50, and redeemed $10 in Points discount (Member paid $40 using accepted payment method). If the Member returns the item with a receipt, the Member will receive back $40 - the price of the original item minus the value of the Points redeemed and 1,000 points ($10) will be returned to the Members Account.
  3. Returnwithouta receipt(not an exchange)- If a Member does not have a receipt, the return will be processed in the same manner as any other allowable return without a receipt present, but the Points redeemed with the original purchase will be returned to the Member's available Points balance where confirmed as a Member by Perfumania sales records (only in the event the transaction can be found manually).
  4. Processing an Exchange with a receipt- If a Member (with a receipt) wishes to exchange a purchased item for a higher priced item, the Member must pay the difference due for the higher priced item.If a Member (with a receipt) wishes to exchange a purchased item for a lower priced item,the following will apply:

(i) If the difference between the price of the original item and the price of the exchange item is greater than the value of the Points used, then the Member will be refunded (in cash or credit) only the amount by which such difference exceeds the value of the Points redeemed with the original purchase.Example- A Member purchased an item for $50, and redeemed $10 in Points (Member paid $40 using an acceptable payment method). If the Member exchanges the original item for an item priced at $30, the Member will receive $10 in cash or credit and 1000 Points will be returned to the Members available Points balance.

(ii) If the difference between the price of the original item and the price of the exchange item is less than or equal to value of the Points redeemed with the original purchase, then the Member willNOTreceive a cash or credit refund, however, the Member will receive back the Points redeemed with the original transactions.Example- A Member purchased an item priced at $50, and redeemed $10 in Points (Member paid $40 using an acceptable payment method). If the Member exchanges that item for an item priced at $47, the Member will not receive a cash or credit refund, because the difference between the price of the original item and the price of the exchange item ($3) is less than the value of the Points redeemed with the original purchase ($10). The 1000 Points ($10) applied in the original purchase will be credited back to the Members Account and the 700 Points ($7) due will be applied to and redeemed for the exchange transaction with the remaining 300 Points ($3) returned to the member.

  1. Points Accounts
  2. Upon signing up for the Perks Program, a Perks Program Points Account (an "Account") will be established for the Member, and this Account will be credited with Points each time an eligible purchase is made, subject to these Terms and Conditions.
  3. Members are able to access their Accounts and review the balance of accrued Points by accessing the Website. A link to sign in to Member Accounts will appear on the Website. Perfumania Member Account numbers and passwords will control access to and use of the Accounts.
  4. Member Accounts can be accessed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week on the Website. Members are responsible for the selection and use of an Account password and for maintaining the confidentiality of that password. Perfumania recommends that Members not divulge Account numbers and/or passwords to anyone. Each Member is solely responsible for any actions taken by any person or entity who obtains the Member's Account number and/or password, including, without limitation, any redemption of earned Points, any violation(s) of these Terms and Conditions and/or all other applicable Perfumania rules and regulations, and any disclosure or details of the Member's Account or further disclosure of the Member's Account number and/or password. Perfumania is not and shall have no liability for any losses or damages of any kind or nature, resulting from unauthorized access to, or use of, a Member's Account or password.
  5. Program Changes; Program Termination
  6. Perfumania reserves the right to change these Terms and Conditions and the Perks Program rules, benefits or regulations at any time and without notice. This means, by way of example only, that Perfumania can change the manner in which Points are earned, accumulated, and/or converted, and/or the manner in which Points are redeemed. Such changes may include modifications that, among other things, (1) alter the Points earned per dollar spent, (2) alter the Points required to reach a Membership Tier, (3) alter the percentage discount for a Membership Tier, (4) alter what activities, other than purchases, qualify for earning Points, (5) alter any other benefit of the Perks Program, and/or (6) limit the eligible transactions, activities and/or merchandise to which Points can be applied and/or redeemed. Unless otherwise stated, the Terms and Conditions of the Perks Program in effect at the time a Member redeems Points will govern that transaction.
  7. Changes to these Terms and Conditions will be posted on the Website. It is each Member's responsibility and Members are encouraged to check in regularly to see if there have been any updates to these Terms and Conditions. Perfumania assumes no responsibility or obligation to provide prior, contemporaneous or subsequent notice of changes to the Perks Program or these Terms and Conditions. In the event Perfumania does elect to provide notice of any particular change to the Perks Program or these Terms and Conditions, it does not assume any responsibility or obligation to provide notice of any other or further changes to the Perks Program or these Terms and Conditions, of any kind or nature, and/or or at any time.
  8. Perfumania reserves the right to terminate the Perks Program in its entirety on three (3) months' notice. Perfumania also reserves the right to terminate the Perks Program in its entirety without notice if, in Perfumania's sole discretion, there is any suspected or actual evidence of fraud, electronic or non-electronic tampering or unauthorized intervention with any aspect of the Perks Program, or if fraud or technical difficulties of any sort (e.g., computer viruses, bugs) compromise the integrity of the Perks Program. In the event the Perks Program is terminated, notice will be posted on the Perfumania Website. Upon termination of the Perks Program, Points will no longer be usable toward purchases of Perfumania merchandise or have any other use or value.
  9. Audit
  10. Perfumania reserves the right to audit or investigate Members' Accounts at any time and without notice to ensure compliance with these Terms and Conditions and all other applicable Perfumania rules and regulations.
  11. Should an audit reveal any discrepancy or violation of these Terms and Conditions or other applicable Perfumania rules and regulations, Perfumania may delay or cancel the accrual of Points to that Member's Account, suspend the application of Points to a purchase, and/or cancel any outstanding Points already awarded. During any audit or investigation Perfumania may suspend the Perks Program membership of a Member. While a Member's Account is suspended, that Member may continue to accrue Points, but Perfumania may prohibit application of Points towards purchases (pending or future).
  12. Name and Address Changes

Members are responsible for updating and advising Perfumania of any change of name, email address, phone number and/or postal address on their applicable Accounts. Account updates can only be made in Perfumania stores with a Perfumania sales associate or by email to Customer Service in writing at customerservice@perfumania.com.

  1. Account Discrepancies

Members are responsible for verifying that Points for qualifying purchases and activities are credited to their Accounts. All Account discrepancies must be reported by the Member in writing within two (2) months of the date of activity. Members are responsible for maintaining copies of qualifying transactions for their records until the appropriate Points credit appears in their Accounts. To report an Account discrepancy, Members are directed to contact Customer Service in writing atcustomerservice@perfumania.com.
